/**
 * There are lots of models which include request interfaces
 * (return value: Promise)
 */import ajax from'./ajax';/**
 * register interface
 */export var reqRegister=function reqRegister(user){return ajax('/api/register',user,'POST');};/**
 * login interface
 */export var reqLogin=function reqLogin(_ref){var username=_ref.username,password=_ref.password;return ajax('/api/login',{username:username,password:password},'POST');};/**
 * update user interface
 */export var reqUpdateUser=function reqUpdateUser(user){return ajax('/api/update',user,'POST');};/**
 * get user info according to cookie
 */export var reqUser=function reqUser(){return ajax('/api/user');};/**
 * get userlist
 */export var reqUserList=function reqUserList(type){return ajax('/api/userlist',{type:type});};/**
 * get current user chat info list
 */export var reqChatMsgList=function reqChatMsgList(){return ajax('/api/msglist');};/**
 * update read already
 */export var reqReadMsg=function reqReadMsg(from){return ajax('/api/readmsg',{from:from},'POST');};
